✨ what size can i make these mittens? ✨

✔️ mittens - 6 sizes: baby to adult
believe it or not, these mittens are crocheted flat. this uses a unique construction from the sewing world, but we are going to create it from crochet. we will work sideways, starting with half the thumb, then work the body of the mitten, then the other half of the thumb. the piece will then be folded and seamed to create the final mitten.
